subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Maria Riesch won a World Cup super-combined race, while Lindsey Vonn finished sixth in her first race back since withdrawing from the world championships because of a concussion.
snippet: Maria Riesch won a World Cup super-combined race, while Lindsey Vonn finished sixth in her first race back since withdrawing from the world championships because of a concussion.
